SEARCH

Class PopularPairsReportPanel

java.lang.Object
PopularPairsReportPanel
public class PopularPairsReportPanel extends Object
Provides a panel to generate and display reports about popular pairings of items within a specified date range.

  • Method Details

    • getPopularPairs

      public List<List<String>> getPopularPairs(String startMonth, String startDay, String startYear, String endMonth, String endDay, String endYear)
      Fetches popular pairs of items from the database based on orders between the specified dates.
      Parameters:
      startMonth - Start date's month.
      startDay - Start date's day.
      startYear - Start date's year.
      endMonth - End date's month.
      endDay - End date's day.
      endYear - End date's year.
      Returns:
      A list of popular pairs.

    • updateReportPanel

      public void updateReportPanel(List<List<String>> popularPairs)
      Updates the report panel to display the given popular pairs.
      Parameters:
      popularPairs - A list of popular pairs to display.

    • updateReportPanel

      public void updateReportPanel(String message)
      Updates the report panel to display the given message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display.

    • getTextFieldWithText

      public JTextField getTextFieldWithText(String defaultText, int maxLength)
      Generates a JTextField with specified default text and maximum length.
      Parameters:
      defaultText - The default text to display in the text field.
      maxLength - The maximum length of text allowed in the text field.
      Returns:
      JTextField with specified default text and length.

    • getPopularPairsReportPanel

      public JPanel getPopularPairsReportPanel()
      Returns the main JPanel for this report panel.
